anya-e0902n:11_1: paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n:12_1: paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ majjhimaṃ nāma nikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n:13_1: majjhimanikāyo nāma āvuso mūlapaṇṇāsako majjhima paṇṇāsako uparipaṇṇāsakoti paṇṇāsakavasena tividho,
anya-e0902n:14_1: tīsu bhante paṇṇāsakesu mūlapaṇṇāsakaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ dhammasaṃgāhakā mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n:15_1: mūlapaṇṇāsakepi āvuso pañcavaggā paṇṇāsa ca suttāni,
anya-e0902n:15_2: tesu kataraṃ vaggaṃ katarañca suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n:16_1: mūlapaṇṇāsake bhante pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamaṃ mūlapariyāyavaggaṃ paṇṇāsakesu ca suttesu paṭhamaṃ mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n:17_0: Sādhu āvuso mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgītipubbaṅgamāni pucchāvissajjanakiccāni kātuṃ samārabhāma.
anya-e0902n:19_1: tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:20_1: ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ bhante pañcasate brāhmaṇakulā pabbajite ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:20_2: pañcasatā bhante brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā bhikkhū pariyattiṃ nissāya mānaṃ uppādesuṃ,
anya-e0902n:21_0: Pucchā – taṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā katihi vārehi katihi ca antogadhapadehi vibhajitvā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:22_1: taṃ pana bhante mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ bhagavatā aṭṭhahi ca vārehi catuvīsatiyā ca antogadhapadehi vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:24_0: Pucchā – dutiyaṃ panāvuso sabbāsavasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:25_0: Vissajjanā – sabbāsavasuttaṃ pana bhante bhagavatā sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:26_0: Pucchā – tatthāvuso bhagavatā āsavā katihi pakārehi vibhajitvā dassitā.
anya-e0902n:27_0: Vissajjanā – sattahi bhante pakārehi vibhajitvā āsavā bhagavatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:29_0: Pucchā – dhammadāyādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:30_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:30_2: bhagavato ca bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tadā mahālābhasakkāro udapādi,
anya-e0902n:31_2: tesu paṭhame anusandhimhi kathaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0902n:32_1: paṭhame bhante anusandhimhi dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā,
anya-e0902n:32_3: kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ no āmisadāyādāti evamādinā bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0902n:33_0: Dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā,
anya-e0902n:33_1: atthi me tumhesu anukampā kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0902n:34_1: dutiye panāvuso anusandhimhi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā kīdisī dhammadesanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:35_1: dutiye pana bhante anusandhimhi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā satthu pavivittassa viharato
anya-e0902n:35_2: sāvakānaṃ vivekaṃ ananusikkhataṃ tīhi ṭhānehi gārayutaṃ,
anya-e0902n:35_4: soḷasa ca pāpake dhamme tesañca pahānāya majjhimā paṭipadā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:37_0: Pucchā – bhayabheravasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:38_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:38_2: jāṇussoṇi bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ye me bho gotama kulaputtā bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ
anya-e0902n:39_2: bhoto ca pana gotamassa sā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjatī”ti,
anya-e0902n:41_0: Pucchā – anaṅgaṇasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:42_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:44_0: Pucchā – ākaṅkheyyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:45_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:47_0: Pucchā – vatthasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:48_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:50_0: Pucchā – sallekhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:51_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ mahācundaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:51_2: āyasmā mahācundo bhante bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “yā imā bhante anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke uppajjanti,
anya-e0902n:51_4: ādimeva nu kho bhante bhikkhuno manasikaroto evametāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0902n:52_0: Pucchā – tattha ca āvuso kati pariyāyā kati ca antogadhapadāni bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:53_1: tattha bhante pañca pariyāyā catucattālīsa ca antogadhapadāni bhagavatā vitthārena bhāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:55_0: Pucchā – sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:56_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:58_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0902n:62_1: mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ panāvuso yogāvacarānaṃ bahupakārattā dīghanikāye ca idha cāti dvīsu nikāyesu porāṇakehi
anya-e0902n:62_3: taṃ amhehi dīghanikāye yathānuppattavasena pucchitañca vissajjitañca.
anya-e0902n:62_4: Tathāpi yogāvacarānaṃ bahupakārattāyeva taṃ idānipi yathānuppattavasena puna pucchissāmi,
anya-e0902n:62_5: taṃ panetaṃ āvuso mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:63_0: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:64_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha ānāpānassati kāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:65_1: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
anya-e0902n:65_2: ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā so satova assasati,
anya-e0902n:65_6: evamādinā bhante tattha ānāpānassati kāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:66_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha iriyāpathakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:67_1: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n:67_5: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā iriyāpathakāyānupassanā bhāvanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:68_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha sampajaññakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:69_1: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti,
anya-e0902n:69_5: asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti,
anya-e0902n:69_7: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti,
anya-e0902n:69_8: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha sampajaññakāyānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:70_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha paṭikūlamanasikārakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:71_1: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa
anya-e0902n:71_2: asucino paccavekkhati atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesālomā nakhā dantā taco evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n:72_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha dhātumanasikārakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:73_1: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati atthi imasmiṃ
anya-e0902n:73_2: kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu evamādinā bhante bhagavatā dhātumanasikārakāyānupassanā
anya-e0902n:74_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha nava sivathikakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:75_1: puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ ekāhamataṃ vā dvīhamataṃ
anya-e0902n:75_2: vā tīhamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātaṃ so imameva kāyaṃ upasaṃharati “ayampi kho kāyo
anya-e0902n:75_3: evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā nava sivathikakāyānupassanā bhāvanā
anya-e0902n:76_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha vedanānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n:77_1: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sukhaṃ vā vedanaṃ vedayamāno “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n:77_2: dukkhaṃ vā vedanaṃ vedayamāno “dukkha vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n:77_3: adukkhamasukhaṃ vā vedanaṃ vedayamāno “adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n:77_4: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā vedanānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:78_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha cittānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n:79_1: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ “sarāgaṃ citta”nti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n:79_3: sadosaṃ vā vītadosaṃ vā samohaṃ vā vītamohaṃ vā saṃkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ “saṃkhittaṃ citta”nti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n:79_5: evamādinā tattha bhagavatā cittānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:80_1: kathañcāvuso tattha dhammānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā,
anya-e0902n:81_1: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati,
anya-e0902n:81_2: pañcasu nīvaraṇesu evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā pañcahi pabbehi dhammānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:83_0: Pucchā – cūḷanasīhanādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:84_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante parihīnalābhasakkāre nānātitthiye ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:84_2: nānātitthiyā bhante parihīnalābhasakkārā tesu tesu ṭhānesu parideviṃsu,
anya-e0902n:84_3: catasso ca bhante parisā bhagavato ekamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ,
anya-e0902n:86_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:87_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante sunakkhattaṃ licchaviputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:87_2: sanukkhatto bhante licchaviputto acirapakkanto hoti imasmā dhammavinayā,
anya-e0902n:87_3: so vesāliyaṃ parisati evaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati “natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso,
anya-e0902n:87_4: takkapariyāhataṃ samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃ paṭibhānaṃ.
anya-e0902n:87_5: Yassa ca khvāssa atthāya dhammo desito,
anya-e0902n:87_7: etamatthaṃ bhante āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato ārocesi,
anya-e0902n:88_1: kati panāvuso tattha bhagavatā tathāgatassa tathāgatabalāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni,
anya-e0902n:88_2: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,

anya-e0902n:89_2: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
anya-e0902n:90_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā catuverajjañāṇāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni,
anya-e0902n:90_2: yehi vesārajjehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
anya-e0902n:91_1: khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ime āsavā aparikkhīṇāti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro
anya-e0902n:91_2: vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti nimittametaṃ sāriputta na samanupassāmi,
anya-e0902n:91_3: etamahaṃ sāriputta nimittaṃ asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi.
anya-e0902n:91_4: Evamādinā bhante tattha catuvesārajjañāṇāni bhagavatā vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.

anya-e0902n:97_0: Pucchā – mahādukkhakkhandhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:98_2: sambahulā bhante aññatitthiyā bhikkhū etadavocuṃ “samaṇo āvuso gotamo kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeti,
anya-e0902n:98_4: samaṇo āvuso gotamo rūpānaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeti,
anya-e0902n:98_8: kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākaṃ vā yadidaṃ dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesanaṃ anusāsaniyā vā anusāsani”nti,
anya-e0902n:100_0: Pucchā – cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:101_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:101_2: mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “dīgharattāhaṃ bhante bhagavatā evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi ‘lobho cittassa upakkileso,
anya-e0902n:101_5: evañcāhaṃ bhante bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi ‘lobho cittassa upakkileso,
anya-e0902n:101_8: Atha ca pana me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0902n:101_11: tassa mayhaṃ bhante evaṃ hoti ‘ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahino,
anya-e0902n:101_12: yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0902n:103_0: Pucchā – anumānasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n:106_0: Pucchā – cetokhilasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:107_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:109_0: Pucchā – vanapatthasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:110_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:112_0: Pucchā – madhupiṇḍikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:113_1: sakkesu bhante daṇḍapāṇiṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:113_2: daṇḍapāṇi bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “kiṃ vādī samaṇo kimakkhāyī”ti,
anya-e0902n:115_0: Pucchā – dvedhāvitakkasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:116_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:118_0: Pucchā – vitakkasaṇṭhānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:119_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:121_2: sammāsambuddhena kakacūpamasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:122_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ moḷiyaphaggunaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:122_2: āyasmā bhante moḷiyaphagguno bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ ativelaṃ saṃsaṭṭho viharati,
anya-e0902n:123_1: atha kho āvuso āyasmato moḷiyaphaggunassa taṃ bhagavato ovādaṃ sutvā kathaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ,
anya-e0902n:124_1: atha kho bhante moḷiyaphaggunassa bhagavato imaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā bhikkhunisaṃsaggato oramissāmi viramissāmītipi cittaṃ na uppannaṃ,
anya-e0902n:124_3: bhagavā ca bhante ārādhayiṃsu vata me bhikkhave bhikkhū ekaṃ samayaṃ cittaṃ,
anya-e0902n:125_0: Ubhato daṇḍakena cepi bhikkhave kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṃ.
anya-e0902n:127_0: Pucchā – alagaddūpamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n:128_2: ariṭṭhassa bhante bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājādāmi,
anya-e0902n:128_3: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
anya-e0902n:129_1: atha kho āvuso āyasmato ariṭṭhassa gaddhabādhipubbassa kathaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi,
anya-e0902n:129_2: kathañca bhagavā uttari bhikkhunaṃ dhammadesanaṃ pavattesi.
anya-e0902n:130_1: atha kho bhante ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa “kiñcāpi maṃ bhagavā moghapurisavādena vadesi,
anya-e0902n:130_2: na kho pana me maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo na hoti,
anya-e0902n:130_4: evaṃ kho bhante cetaso parivitakko udapādi,
anya-e0902n:130_5: bhagavā ca bhante duppaññassa alagaddūpamaṃ dassetvā alagaddūpamaṃ pariyattiñca dassetvā paññavato alagaddūpamāya
anya-e0902n:130_6: ca kullūpamāya ca paññavato nissaraṇapariyattiṃ dassetvā cha ca diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni,
anya-e0902n:130_7: tesañca channaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānānaṃ viniveṭhanākāraṃ dassetvā pariyosāne ca khandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ arahattanikūṭena
anya-e0902n:132_0: Pucchā – dhammikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:133_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ kumārakassapaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:133_2: Āyasmā bhante kumārakassapo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vammikapañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n:135_0: Pucchā – rathavinītasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:136_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmatā ca sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā ca puṇṇena mantāṇiputtena aññamaññaṃ pucchāvissajjanavasena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:138_0: Pucchā – nivāpasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:139_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:140_1: imasmiṃ āvuso sutte ko nivāpo ko nevāpiko kā nevāpikaparisā kā migajātā kathañcetissā upamāya attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0902n:141_1: imasmiṃ bhante sutte nivāpoti kho bhante pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
anya-e0902n:141_2: nevāpikoti kho bhante mārassetaṃ pāpimato adhivacanaṃ,
anya-e0902n:141_5: imasmiṃ bhante sutte etassa attho evaṃ daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0902n:143_2: sammāsambuddhena pāsarāsisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:144_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:144_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rammakassa brāhmaṇassa assame bhagavantaṃ ārabbha dhammiyā kathāya sannisīdiṃsu,
anya-e0902n:145_1: atha kho āvuso tesaṃ sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sannisinnānaṃ kīdisaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n:146_1: sādhu bhikkhave etaṃ kho bhikkhave tumhākaṃ patirūpaṃ kulaputtānaṃ saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānaṃ,
anya-e0902n:146_3: sannipatitānaṃ vo bhikkhave dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī vā kathā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo.
anya-e0902n:146_4: Dvemā bhikkhave pariyesanā ariyā ca pariyesanā anariyā ca pariyesanā.
anya-e0902n:146_5: Evamādinā bhante bhagavā sannipatitānaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ariyapariyesanañca anariyapariyesanañca vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0902n:147_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā attanāpi anariyapariyesanaṃ pahāya ariyapariyesanāya pariyesitabhāvaṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n:148_1: ahampi sudaṃ bhikkhave pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesāmi,
anya-e0902n:148_2: attanā jarādhammo byādhidhammo maraṇadhammo sokadhammo saṃkilesadhammo samāno saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva pariyesāmi.
anya-e0902n:148_3: Evamādinā bhante bhagavā attanāpi anariyapariyesanaṃ pahāya ariyapariyesanāya pariyesitabhāvaṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n:149_1: evaṃ paṭhamābhisambuddhassa āvuso bhagavato ajapālanigrodharukkhamūle nisinnassa dhammadesanāya katasanniṭṭhānassa kīdiso
anya-e0902n:151_1: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ,
anya-e0902n:151_2: ko imaṃ dhammaṃ khippameva ājānissatī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato paṭhamābhisambuddhassa ajapālanigrodhamūle
anya-e0902n:151_4: atha bhante bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena bārāṇasī,
anya-e0902n:151_6: dveme bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā,
anya-e0902n:151_8: yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gāmmo pothujjaniko anariyo anattasaṃhito,
anya-e0902n:151_9: evamādinā bhante bhagavato paṭhamā dhammadesanā ahosi.
anya-e0902n:156_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā pāsarāsiupamāya taṃ desanaṃ pariniṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0902n:157_3: cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
anya-e0902n:157_7: Kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
anya-e0902n:157_9: Ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ime kāmaguṇe gathitā mucchitā ajjhopannā anādīnavadassāvino anissaraṇapaññā paribhuñjanti,
anya-e0902n:157_10: te evamassu veditabbā “anayamāpannā byāsanamāpannā yathākāmakaraṇīyā pāpimato”,
anya-e0902n:157_11: evamādinā bhante bhagavā pāsarāsiupamāya dhammadesanaṃ pariniṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0902n:159_2: sammāsambuddhena cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:160_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:160_2: Jāṇussoṇi bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yāvatako ahosi pilotikena paribbājakena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo,
anya-e0902n:161_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā hatthipadopamaṃ vitthārena paripūretvā desesi.
anya-e0902n:162_1: “na kho brāhmaṇa ettāvatā hatthipadopamo vitthārena paripūro hoti,
anya-e0902n:162_2: api ca brāhmaṇa yathā hatthipadopamo vitthārena paripūro hoti,
anya-e0902n:162_4: evamādinā bhante bhagavā hatthipadopamaṃ paripūretvā brāhmaṇassa jāṇussoṇissa desesi.
anya-e0902n:164_0: Pucchā – mahāhatthipadopamasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:165_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:167_0: Pucchā – mahāsāropamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:168_2: devadatto bhante saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ruhiruppādakammaṃ katvā acirapakkanto hoti,
anya-e0902n:170_0: Pucchā – cūḷasāropamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:171_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante piṅgalakocchaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:171_2: piṅgalakoccho bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n:173_0: Pucchā – cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:174_0: Vissajjanā – nābhike bhante gosiṅgasālavanadāye āyasmatā anuruddhattherena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:176_0: Pucchā – mahāgosiṅgasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:177_1: gosiṅgasālavanadāye bhante āyasmatā ca sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:179_0: Pucchā – mahāgopālakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:180_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:182_0: Pucchā – cūḷagopālakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:183_0: Vissajjanā – vajjīsu bhante ukkacelāyaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:185_2: sammāsambuddhena cūḷasaccakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:186_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:186_2: saccako nigaṇṭhaputto mahatiyā licchaviparisāya saddhiṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0902n:186_3: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kathaṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo sāvake vineti,
anya-e0902n:186_4: kathaṃ bhāgā ca pana bhoto gotamassa sāvakesu anusāsanī bahulā pavattatī”ti,
anya-e0902n:186_5: atha bhante bhagavatā aniccavāde ca anattavāde ca pakāsite saccako nigaṇṭhaputto pathavīupamaṃ dassetvā attano attavādaṃ pakāsesi,
anya-e0902n:187_1: evaṃ āvuso saccakena nigaṇṭhaputtena mahāpathavīupamaṃ dassetvā attavāde pakāsite kathaṃ bhagavā taṃ
anya-e0902n:187_2: attavādaṃ puna patiṭṭhāpetvā samanuyuñji samanugāhi samanubhāsi.
anya-e0902n:188_7: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ taṃ attavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0902n:188_8: Patiṭṭhāpetvā ca pana bhante bhagavā “tena hi aggivessana taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi,
anya-e0902n:188_10: tathā taṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ samanuyuñji samanugāhi samanubhāsi.
anya-e0902n:189_1: evaṃ kho āvuso saccake nigaṇṭhaputte tuṇhībhūte adhomukhe pajjhāyante appaṭibhāne nisinne dummukho nāma licchaviputto bhagavantaṃ kiṃ vacanaṃ avoca.
anya-e0902n:190_1: evaṃ bhante saccake nigaṇṭhaputte tuṇhībhūte maṅkubhūte pattakkhandhe adhomukhe pajjhāyante appaṭibhāne
anya-e0902n:190_2: dummukho licchaviputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “upamā maṃ bhagavā paṭibhātī”ti.
anya-e0902n:191_1: atha kho āvuso saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṃ kīdisaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n:192_1: atha kho bhante saccako nigaṇṭhaputto dummukhaṃ licchaviṃ apasādetvā bhagavantaṃ sekhañca asekhañca pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n:192_2: bhagavā ca bhante “idha aggivessana mama sāvako yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā
anya-e0902n:192_3: bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā” evamādinā sekhañca asekhañca
anya-e0902n:193_0: Buddho so bhagavā bodhāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n:194_0: Danto so bhagavā damathāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n:195_0: Santo so bhagavā samathāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n:196_0: Tiṇṇo so bhagavā taraṇāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n:197_0: Parinibbuto so bhagavā parinibbānāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n:199_0: Pucchā – mahāsaccakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:200_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante saccakaṃyeva nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:200_2: Saccako bhante nigaṇṭhaputto aparadivase bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato sāvake āsajja bhāvanādvayapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
anya-e0902n:201_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ paṭipucchitvā bhāvanādvayaṃ vibhajja kathesi.
anya-e0902n:202_1: atha kho bhante bhagavā “kinti pana te aggivessana kāyabhāvanā sutā”ti evamādinā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ paṭipucchitvā,
anya-e0902n:202_2: kathañca aggivessana abhāvitakāyo ca hoti abhāvitacitto ca evamādinā bhāvanādvayaṃ vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n:203_1: atha kho āvuso saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṃ kiṃ vacanaṃ avoca,
anya-e0902n:203_2: kathañca bhagavā padhānakāle attanāanubhūtapubbā paramukkaṃsagatā sukhadukkhavedanāyo pakāsesi,
anya-e0902n:203_3: yāpi bhagavato cittaṃ na pariyādāya aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0902n:204_1: atha kho bhante saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “na hi nūna bhoto gotamassa uppajjati,
anya-e0902n:204_3: yathārūpā uppannā sukhāvedanā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya,
anya-e0902n:204_4: na hi nūna bhoto gotamassa uppajjati tathārūpā dukkhā vedanā,
anya-e0902n:204_5: yathārūpā uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyyā”ti atha kho bhagavā “kiñhi no siyā aggivessana,
anya-e0902n:204_6: idha me aggivessena pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi,
anya-e0902n:204_7: evamādinā bhante bhagavā padhānakāle attanānubhūtapubbā paramukkaṃsagatā sukhadukkhavedanāyo vitthārena,
anya-e0902n:204_8: yāpi bhagavato cittaṃ na pariyādāya aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0902n:206_2: sammāsambuddhena cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:207_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:207_2: Sakko bhante devānamindo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “kittāvatānukho bhante bhikkhu saṃkhittena
anya-e0902n:207_3: taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho
anya-e0902n:208_0: Kittāvatā nu kho bhante bhikkhu saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemī
anya-e0902n:210_0: Pucchā – mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:211_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sātiṃ bhikkhuṃ kevaṭṭaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:211_2: Sātissa bhante bhikkhuno kevaṭṭaputtassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
anya-e0902n:211_3: yathā tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”nti.
anya-e0902n:212_1: atha kho āvuso bhagavā kathaṃ bhikkhū āmantetvā ca paṭipucchitvā ca anattabhāvadīpikaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n:213_1: atha bhante bhagavā bhikkhū “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0902n:213_2: apināyaṃ sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto usmīkatopi ismiṃ dhammavinaye”ti āmantetvā,
anya-e0902n:213_3: tumhepi me bhikkhave evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāthatyādinā bhikkhū paṭipucchitvā ca yaṃ yadeva bhikkhave paccayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0902n:213_4: tena teneva viññāṇaṃ tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0902n:213_5: cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0902n:213_6: evamādinā bhante anattatādīpikaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n:215_0: Pucchā – mahāassapurasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:216_1: aṅgesu bhante assapure nāma aṅgānaṃ nigame bahū manusse saddhe pasanne ārabbbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:216_2: Bahū bhante manussā saddhā pasannā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
anya-e0902n:217_1: katame āvuso tattha bhagavatā dhammā samaṇakaraṇā ca brāhmaṇakaraṇā ca uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītā desitā.
anya-e0902n:218_1: hirottappā parisuddhakāyasamācāro parisuddhavacīsamācāro parisuddhamanosamācāro parisuddhājīvo indriyesu
anya-e0902n:218_2: guttadvāratā bhojanemattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo satisampajaññaṃ nīvaraṇappahānaṃ cattāri ca jhānāni tisso
anya-e0902n:218_3: ca vijjā ime kho bhante tattha bhagavatā samaṇakaraṇā ca brāhmaṇakaraṇā ca uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītā dhammā desitā.
anya-e0902n:220_0: Pucchā – cūḷaassapurasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā katta kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n:249_0: Pucchā – brahmanimantanikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:250_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n:253_2: Māro bhante pāpimā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa kucchigato hoti koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭho.
anya-e0902n:256_2: sammāsambuddhena kandarakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:257_1: campāyaṃ bhante gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre pessañca hatthārohaputtaṃ kandarakañca paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:257_2: kandarako bhante paribbājako bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
anya-e0902n:257_3: pesso ca bhante hatthārohaputto bhagavato ca dhammadesanāya ca vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e0902n:258_1: evaṃ kho āvuso kandarakena paribbājakena bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca abhippasannena vaṇṇe bhāsite
anya-e0902n:258_2: kathaṃ bhagavā taṃ samanujānitvā dhammadesanārambhaṃ ārabhi,
anya-e0902n:258_3: kathañca pesso hatthārohaputto bhagavato ca dhammadesanāya ca vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
anya-e0902n:258_4: kathañca pessassa hatthārohaputtassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n:259_1: evaṃ kho bhante kandarakena paribbājakena bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca abhippasannena vaṇṇe bhāsite
anya-e0902n:259_2: “evametaṃ kandaraka evametaṃ kandaraka” evamādinā bhagavā taṃ samanujānitvā “santi hi kandaraka bhikkhū
anya-e0902n:259_3: imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā
anya-e0902n:259_5: Atha kho bhante pesso hatthārohaputto “acchariyaṃ bhante abbhutaṃ bhante yāva supaññattā cime bhante
anya-e0902n:259_6: bhagavatā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya
anya-e0902n:259_7: ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavato ca dhammadesanāya vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
anya-e0902n:259_9: uttānakañhetaṃ pessa yadidaṃ pasavo”tiādinā pessassa hatthārohaputtassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammakathaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n:260_1: taṃ panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pessassa hatthārohaputtassa kīdiso ānisaṃso adhigato,
anya-e0902n:260_2: kathañca bhagavā taṃ puggalacatukkadesanaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:261_1: taṃ kho pana bhante dhammaṃ sutvā pessassa hatthārohaputtassa dve ānisaṃsā adhigatā saṅghe ca pasādo satipaṭṭhānapariggahaṇūpāyo ca abhinavo.
anya-e0902n:261_2: Bhagavā ca bhante taṃ puggalacatukkadesanaṃ bhikkhūhi yācito “katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto”tiādinā saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:263_0: Pucchā – aṭṭhakanāgarasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:264_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante veḷuvagāmake gahapatiṃ aṭṭhakanāgaraṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:264_2: Dasamo bhante gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “atthi nu kho bhante
anya-e0902n:264_3: ānanda tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo akkhāto,
anya-e0902n:264_4: yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva cittaṃ vimuccati,
anya-e0902n:266_0: Pucchā – sekhasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:267_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ santhāgāre āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena kāpilavatthave sakye ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:267_2: Bhagavā bhante kāpilavatthave sakye bahudevarattiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā
anya-e0902n:267_3: sampahaṃsetvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi “paṭibhātu taṃ ānanda kāpilavatthavānaṃ sakyānaṃ sekho pāṭipado,
anya-e0902n:269_0: Pucchā – potaliyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:270_1: aṅguttarāpesu bhante āpaṇe nāma aṅguttarāpānaṃ nigame potaliyaṃ gahapatiṃ paṭikkhittasabbakammantaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:270_2: Potaliyo bhante gahapati paṭikkhittasabbakammanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0902n:270_3: upasaṅkamanto bhagavatā gahapativādena samudācariyamāno kupito anattamano bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “tayidaṃ bho gotama nacchannaṃ tayidaṃ nappatirūpaṃ,
anya-e0902n:271_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ vitthārena pakāsetvā ariyassa vinaye vohārasamucchedaṃ dassesi.
anya-e0902n:272_1: atha bhante bhagavā ariyassa vinaye vohārasamucchedāya aṭṭha dhamme vibhajitvā “seyyathāpi gahapati kukkuro
anya-e0902n:272_2: jighacchādubbalyapareto goghātakasūnaṃ paccupaṭṭhito assa” evamādinā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ dassetvā pariyosāne
anya-e0902n:272_3: tīhi vijjāhi ariyassa vinaye vohārasamucchedaṃ sabbenasabbaṃ sabbathāsabbaṃ vohārasamucchedaṃ vitthārena
anya-e0902n:274_2: sammāsambuddhena jīvakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:275_1: rājagahe bhante jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:275_2: Jīvako bhante komārabhacco bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bhante samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ ārabhanti,
anya-e0902n:275_3: taṃ samaṇo gotamo jānaṃ uddissa kataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjati paṭicca kammanti.
anya-e0902n:275_4: Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu ‘samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ ārabhanti,
anya-e0902n:275_5: taṃ samaṇo gotamo jānaṃ uddissa kataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjati paṭicca kamma’nti,
anya-e0902n:275_6: kacci te bhante bhagavato vuttavādino na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti,
anya-e0902n:275_8: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatī”ti.
anya-e0902n:277_0: Pucchā – upālisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:278_1: nāḷandāyaṃ bhante upāliṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:278_2: Upāli bhante gahapati bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “āgamā nukhvidha bhante dīghatapassī nigaṇṭho”ti,
anya-e0902n:278_3: evamādinā ca bhante upāli gahapati bhagavato paṭisandhāraṃ katvā attano ācariyassa nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa vādaṃ pakāsesi,
anya-e0902n:279_1: atha kho āvuso bhagavā upāliṃ gahapatiṃ tasmiṃ vāde kathaṃ samanuyuñjī samanugāhī samanubhāsī,
anya-e0902n:279_2: kathañcassa upāyaṃ dassetvā yathābhūtaṃ atthaṃ ñāpesi.
anya-e0902n:280_1: atha kho bhante bhagavā upāliṃ gahapatiṃ “sace kho tvaṃ gahapati sacce patiṭṭhāya manteyyāsi,
anya-e0902n:280_2: siyā no ettha kathāsallāpo”ti upāliṃ gahapatiṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā “taṃ kiṃmaññasi gahapati,
anya-e0902n:280_3: idhassa nigaṇṭho ābādhiko dukkhito bāñhagilāno sītodakaparikkhitto uṇhodakapaṭisevī,
anya-e0902n:280_4: so sītodakaṃ alabhamāno kālaṅkareyyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavā cattāro upāye dassetvā upāliṃ gahapatiṃ yathābhūtamatthaṃ ñāpesi.
anya-e0902n:281_1: evaṃ kho āvuso upāli gahapati bhagavatā saññāpito imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāraṃ akāsi,
anya-e0902n:281_2: kathañca bhagavā taṃ puna anusāsitvā uttari vinesi.
anya-e0902n:282_2: apicāhaṃ imāni bhagavato vicitrāni pañhapaṭibhānāni sotukāmo,
anya-e0902n:282_4: evamādinā bhante upāli gahapati bhagavatā viññāpito imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāraṃ akāsi.
anya-e0902n:282_5: Tattha bhagavā ca bhante “anuviccakāraṃ kho gahapati karohi,
anya-e0902n:282_6: anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṃ ñātamanussānaṃ sādhu hotī”ti evamādinā puna anusāsitvā uttari yāva dhammacakkhupaṭilābhā vinesi.
anya-e0902n:283_1: kathañcāvuso nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa upālissa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ gantvā āvīmaṃsanā ca upālissa gahapatissa paccuttarā kathā ca ahosi.
anya-e0902n:284_1: “ummattosi tvaṃ gahapati dattosi tvaṃ gahapatī”ti evamādinā bhante nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa upālissa
anya-e0902n:284_2: gahapatissa nivesanaṃ gantvā vīmaṃsā ca “bhaddikā bhante āvaṭṭanīmāyā kalyāṇī bhante āvaṭṭanīmāyāti”
anya-e0902n:284_3: evamādinā upālissa gahapatissa paccuttarakathā ca ahosi.
anya-e0902n:304_0: Pucchā – kukkuravatikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:305_1: koliyesu bhante haliddavasane nāma koliyānaṃ nigame puṇṇañca koliyaputtaṃ govatikaṃ acelañca seniyaṃ kukkuravatikaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:305_2: Puṇṇo bhante koliya putto govatiko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ bhante acelo seniyo kukkuravatiko dukkarakārako chamānikkhittaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e0902n:305_3: tassa taṃ kukkuravataṃ dīgharattaṃ samattaṃ samādinnaṃ,
anya-e0902n:307_2: sammāsambuddhena abhayarājakumārasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:308_1: rājagahe me bhante abhayaṃ rājakumāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:308_2: Abhayo bhante rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “bhāseyya nu kho bhante tathāgato taṃ vācaṃ,
anya-e0902n:308_3: yā sā vācā paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā”ti,
anya-e0902n:310_0: Pucchā – bahuvedanīyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:311_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantañca udāyiṃ pañcakaṅgañca thapatiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:311_2: pañcakaṅgo bhante thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ upasaṅkamitvā vedanaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n:311_3: āyasmā bhante udāyī pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ etadavoca “tisso kho thapati vedanā vuttā bhagavatā sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti.
anya-e0902n:311_4: Evaṃ vutte bhante pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca “na kho bhante udāyi tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā,
anya-e0902n:311_5: dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā,
anya-e0902n:311_7: santasmiṃ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
anya-e0902n:311_8: Neva asakkhi kho bhante āyasmā udāyī pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ saññāpetuṃ,
anya-e0902n:311_9: na pana asakkhi pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ saññāpetuṃ.
anya-e0902n:311_10: Assosi kho āyasmā ānando āyasmato udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhiṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ,
anya-e0902n:311_11: atha kho bhante āyasmā ānando yāvatako ahosi āyasmato udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo,
anya-e0902n:313_0: Pucchā – apaṇṇakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:314_1: kosalesu bhante sālāyaṃ nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāme sāleyyake brāhmaṇagahapatike ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:314_2: Sambahulā bhante aññatitthiyā sāleyyakānaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ attano attano micchādiṭṭhiyo paṭiggaṇhāpesuṃ uggaṇhāpesuṃ.
anya-e0902n:314_3: Te pana bhante sāleyyakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ekadiṭṭhiyampi patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkhiṃsu.
anya-e0902n:315_0: Pucchā – tatra āvuso bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ micchāvādo ca sammāvādo ca kathaṃ vibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n:316_1: tatra bhante bhagavatā “santi gahapatayo eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino natthi dinnaṃ natthi
anya-e0902n:316_2: yiṭṭhaṃ natthi hutaṃ natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ti evamādinā paṭhamaṃ micchāvādo
anya-e0902n:317_0: Pucchā – tattha āvuso bhagavatā micchāvādīnañca doso sammāvādīnañca guṇo kathaṃ vicāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n:318_1: tattha bhante bhagavatā “tatra gahapatayo yete samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino natthi dinnaṃ natthi
anya-e0902n:318_2: yiṭṭhaṃ natthi hutaṃ natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ti evamādinā bhante micchāvādīnañca
anya-e0902n:318_3: doso sammāvādīnañca guṇo bhagavatā vicāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n:319_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā viññuno purisapuggalassa paṭisañcikkhaṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:320_1: tatra gahapatayo viññū puriso iti paṭisañcikkhatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā viññuno purisapuggalassa paṭisañcikkhaṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:321_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavatā aññesupi micchāvādasammāvādesu apaṇṇakapaṭipadā vicāretvā pakāsitā,
anya-e0902n:322_2: evameva kho bhante akiriyavādādīsu catūsu ca micchāvādesu dosaṃ kiriyavādādīsu ca catūsu sammāvādesu guṇaṃ,
anya-e0902n:322_3: tattha ca viññuno purisassa paṭisañcikkhaṇākāraṃ dassetvā bhagavatā apaṇṇakapaṭipadā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:324_0: Pucchā – ambalaṭṭhikarāhulovādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:325_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:327_0: Pucchā – mahārāhulovādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:328_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:328_2: Āyasmā bhante rāhulo bhagavato ceva attano ca attabhāvasampattiṃ nissāya gehassitaṃ chandarāgaṃ uppādesi.
anya-e0902n:330_0: Pucchā – cūḷamālukyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:331_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ mālukyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:331_2: Āyasmā bhante mālukyaputto attano pavivittassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa cetaso parivitakkaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
anya-e0902n:333_0: Pucchā – mahāmālukyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:334_0: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ mahāmālukyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:336_2: sammāsambuddhena bhaddālisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:337_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ bhaddāliṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:337_2: Āyasmā bhante bhaddāli bhagavatā sikkhāpade paññāpiyamāne bhikkhusaṅghe sikkhaṃ samādiyamāne anussāhaṃ pavedesi.
anya-e0902n:338_0: Accayo maṃ bhante accagamā yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ,
anya-e0902n:338_1: yohaṃ bhagavatā sikkhāpade paññāpiyamāne bhikkhusaṅghe sikkhaṃ samādiyamāne anussāhaṃ pavedesiṃ,
anya-e0902n:338_2: tassa me bhante bhagavā accayaṃ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṃ saṃvarāya –
anya-e0902n:339_1: atha kho āvuso āyasmā bhaddāli bhagavantaṃ kīdisaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n:340_1: atha kho bhante āyasmā bhaddāli “ko nu kho bhante hetu,
anya-e0902n:340_3: yena midhekaccaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasayu pasayu kāraṇaṃ karontī”ti evamādinā bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi.
anya-e0902n:340_4: Bhagavā ca bhante “idha bhaddāli ekacco bhikkhu abhiṇhāpattiko hoti,
anya-e0902n:340_5: āpattibahulo” evamādinā āyasmato bhaddālissa vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n:341_1: tadāpi kho āvuso āyasmā bhaddāli punapi bhagavantaṃ kīdisaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n:342_1: tadāpi bhante āyasmā bhaddāli “ko nu kho bhante hetu,
anya-e0902n:342_3: yena pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṃ,
anya-e0902n:342_6: ko paccayo yena etarahi bahutarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni honti appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇḍahantī”ti bhagavantaṃ punapi pañhaṃ apucchi.
anya-e0902n:342_8: sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāni honti appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇḍahantī”ti,
anya-e0902n:342_9: evamādinā āyasmato bhaddālissa vibhajitvā vibhajitvā byākatā.
anya-e0902n:344_0: Pucchā – laṭukikopamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:345_1: aṅguttarāpesu bhante āpaṇe nāma aṅguttarāpānaṃ nigame āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:345_2: Āyasmā bhante udāyī bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “idha mayhaṃ bhante rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa
anya-e0902n:345_3: evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā dukkhadhammānaṃ apahattā,
anya-e0902n:345_4: bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā sukhadhammānaṃ upahattā,
anya-e0902n:345_5: bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ apahattā,
anya-e0902n:345_6: bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upahattā’ti”.
anya-e0902n:346_0: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso bhagavā kīdisī upamāyo dassetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n:347_1: atha kho bhante bhagavā laṭukikopamaṃ hatthināgopamaṃ daliddapurisopamaṃ gahapatikopamanti catasso upamāyo dassetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n:348_1: evañcāvuso bhagavā catūhi upamāhi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā kathaṃ uttari dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhesi.
anya-e0902n:349_1: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā catūhi upamāhi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā “cattāro me udāyi puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0902n:349_2: lokasmiṃ”nti evamādinā uttari bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathaṃ pavaḍḍhesi.
anya-e0902n:351_0: Pucchā – cātumasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:352_1: cātumāyaṃ bhante āyasmantānaṃ sāriputtamoggalānattherānaṃ saddhivihārike adhunā pabbajite sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:352_2: Sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni bhante pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṃ anuppattāni honti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya,
anya-e0902n:352_3: te ca āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0902n:353_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n:354_1: cattārimāni bhikkhave bhayāni udakorohante pātikaṅkhitabbānīti evamādinā bhante bhagavā tattha bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n:356_0: Pucchā – naḷakapānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:357_1: naḷakapāne bhante anuruddhattherappamukhe sambahule abhiññāte abhiññāte kulaputte ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:359_0: Pucchā – goliyānisuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:360_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ goliyāniṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:360_2: Āyasmā bhante goliyāni āraññiko padasamācāro saṅghamajjhe osaṭo hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena,
anya-e0902n:362_2: sammāsambuddhena kīṭāgirisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:363_1: kāsīsu bhante kīṭāgirismiṃ kāsīnaṃ nigame assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:363_2: Assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānā evamāhaṃsu “mayaṃ kho āvuso sāyañceva bhuñjāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle,
anya-e0902n:363_3: te mayaṃ sāyañceva bhuñjamānā pāto ca divā ca vikāle appābādhatañca sañjānāma appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañca,
anya-e0902n:363_4: te mayaṃ kiṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ hitvā kālikaṃ anudhāvissāma,
anya-e0902n:363_5: sāyañceva mayaṃ bhuñjissāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle”ti.
anya-e0902n:365_0: Pucchā – tevijjavacchasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:366_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante vacchagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:366_2: Vacchagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sutaṃ me bhante samaṇo gotamo sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti,
anya-e0902n:366_3: carato ca me tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhita”nti.
anya-e0902n:366_4: Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu “samaṇo gotamo sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti,
anya-e0902n:366_5: carato ca me tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhita”nti.
anya-e0902n:366_9: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatī”ti.
anya-e0902n:368_0: Pucchā – aggivacchasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:369_2: Vacchagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ nu kho bho gotama ‘sassato loko idameva
anya-e0902n:369_3: saccaṃ moghamañña’nti evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo”ti evamādikaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi.
anya-e0902n:371_0: Pucchā – mahāvacchasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:372_1: rājagahe bhante vacchagottaṃyeva paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:372_2: Vacchagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “dīgharattāhaṃ bhotā gotamena sahakathī,
anya-e0902n:372_3: sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo saṃkhittena kusalākusalaṃ desetū”ti.
anya-e0902n:373_1: evaṃ vutte kho āvuso vacchagotto paribbājako imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno hutvā kīdisaṃ pasannākāraṃ akāsi,
anya-e0902n:374_1: evaṃ vutte bhante vacchagotto paribbājako “sace hi bho gotama imaṃ dhammaṃ bhavaṃyeva gotamo ārādhako abhavissa,
anya-e0902n:374_2: no ca kho bhikkhū ārādhakā abhavissaṃsu,
anya-e0902n:374_3: evamidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ aparipūraṃ abhavissa tenaṅgenā”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n:376_0: Pucchā – dīghanakhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:377_1: rājagahe bhante dīghanakhaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:377_2: Dīghanakho bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ahañhi bho gotama evaṃvādī evaṃdiṭṭhi sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti.
anya-e0902n:378_0: Pucchā – imasmiṃ ca panāvuso veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne kesaṃ puggalānaṃ visesādhigamo ahosi.
anya-e0902n:379_1: imasmiñca pana bhante veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne āyasmato sāriputtassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci,
anya-e0902n:379_2: dīghanakhassa pana paribbājakassa tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ,
anya-e0902n:381_0: Pucchā – māgaṇḍiyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:382_1: kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame bhāradvāja gottassa brāhmaṇassa agyāgāre tiṇasanthārake māgaṇḍiyaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:382_2: Māgaṇḍiyo bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ “bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo”ti vadesi,
anya-e0902n:383_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā tattha māgaṇḍiyassa paribbājakassa samanuyuñjitvā samanuyuñjitvā dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n:384_2: taṃ tathāgatassa dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ,
anya-e0902n:384_3: tassa ca saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavā māgaṇḍiyassa paribbājakassa samanuyuñjitvā samanuyuñjitvā dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n:385_1: evaṃ kho āvuso māgaṇḍiyena paribbājakena “nakiñci bho gotamā”ti yathābhūtaṃ paṭissute kathaṃ bhagavā attanopi na kiñci kenacipi vattabbataṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n:386_1: evaṃ kho bhante māgaṇḍiyena paribbājakena nakiñci bhogotamāti yathābhūtaṃ paṭissute “ahaṃ kho pana māgaṇḍiya
anya-e0902n:386_2: pubbe agāriyabhūto samāno pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāresiṃ cakkhuviññeyyahi rūpehi
anya-e0902n:386_3: iṭṭhehi manāpehi piyarūpehi kāmūpasaṃhitehi rajanīyehī”ti evamādinā bhagavā attanopi na kiñci kenacipi
anya-e0902n:387_1: imasmiṃ sutte pariyosānapucchaṃ pucchissāmi imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako
anya-e0902n:387_2: imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno hutvā kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n:388_1: imaṃ ca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako ‘abhikkantaṃ bho gotama abhikkantaṃ bho
anya-e0902n:388_2: gotamā”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n:390_0: Pucchā – sandakasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:391_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante sandakaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:391_2: Sandako bhante paribbājako āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “sādhuvata bhavantaṃyeva ānandaṃ paṭibhātu sake ācariya ke dhammikathā”ti,
anya-e0902n:392_1: kathañcāvuso tattha cattāro abrahmacariyavāsā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena vicāretvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:393_1: idha sandaka ekacco satthā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃdiṭṭhi natthi dinnaṃ,
anya-e0902n:394_0: Evamādinā bhante tattha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena cattāro abrahmacariyavāsā vicāretvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:395_1: kathañcāvuso tattha cattāri anassāsikāni brahmacariyāni āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena vicāretvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:396_1: idha sandaka ekacco satthā sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti “carato ca me tiṭṭhato
anya-e0902n:396_2: ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhita”nti evamādinā bhante tattha āyasmatā
anya-e0902n:396_3: ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena cattāri anassāsikāni brahmacariyāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:398_0: Kho āvuso sandako paribbājako āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ kathaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n:399_1: atha kho bhante sandako paribbājako “so pana bho ānanda satthā kiṃvādī kiṃ akkhāyī”ti evamādinā āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n:399_2: āyasmā ca bhante ānandatthero “idha sandaka tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno”ti
anya-e0902n:399_3: evamādinā sandakassa paribbājakassa vibhajitvā vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n:400_1: imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sandako paribbājako imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n:401_1: imañca bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sandako paribbājako “acchariyaṃ bho ānanda,
anya-e0902n:401_6: tāva bahukā ca niyyātāro paññāyissantī”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n:403_0: Pucchā – mahāsakuludāyisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:404_1: rājagahe bhante sakuludāyiṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:404_2: Sakuludāyī bhante paribbājako purimāni divasāni purimatarāni kotūhalasālāyaṃ nānātitthiyānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
anya-e0902n:404_3: yāvatako ahosi bhagavantañca cha ca satthāro ārabbha kathāsallāpo,
anya-e0902n:406_0: Pucchā – samaṇamuṇḍikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:407_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante uggāhamāna paribbājakaṃ samaṇamuṇḍikāputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:407_2: Uggāhamāno bhante paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto pañcakaṅgaṃ tapatiṃ etadavoca “catūhi kho ahaṃ gahapati
anya-e0902n:407_3: dhammehi samannāgataṃ purisapuggalaṃ paññapemi sampannakusalaṃ paramakusalaṃ uttamapattipattaṃ samaṇaṃ
anya-e0902n:409_0: Pucchā – cūḷasakuludāyīsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0902n:509_1: puna pi āvuso āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati kathaṃ dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa aparenapi pariyāyena anusāsaniṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n:510_1: punapi bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati “taṃ kiṃ maññasi dhanañjāni,
anya-e0902n:510_2: yo vā mātāpitūnaṃ hetu adhammacārī visamacārī assa,
anya-e0902n:510_3: yo vā mātāpitūnaṃ hetu dhammacārī samacārī assa,
anya-e0902n:510_5: evamādinā dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa aparenapi pariyāyena ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n:511_1: aparabhāge pi āvuso āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati kathaṃ dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa maraṇasamaye dhammakathaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0902n:512_1: aparabhāge pi bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa maraṇasamayepi cattāro brahmavihāre desesi,
anya-e0902n:512_2: dhanañjāni ca bhante brāhmaṇo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brahmalokūpago ahosi.
anya-e0902n:514_0: Pucchā – vāseṭṭhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:515_1: icchānaṅgale bhante vāseṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:515_2: Vāseṭṭho bhante māṇavo bhagavantaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi –
anya-e0902n:520_0: Tesaṃ no jātivādasmiṃ, vivādo atthi gotama.
anya-e0902n:521_0: Jātiyā brāhmaṇo hoti, bhāradvājo iti bhāsati;
anya-e0902n:522_0: Ahañca kammunā brūmi, evaṃ jānāhi cakkhuma.
anya-e0902n:523_0: Tena sakkoma ñāpetuṃ, aññaṃmaññaṃ mayaṃ ubho;
anya-e0902n:525_0: Candaṃ yathā khayātītaṃ, pecca pañjalikā janā;
anya-e0902n:527_0: Cakkhuṃ loke samuppannaṃ, mayaṃ pucchāma gotamaṃ;
anya-e0902n:528_0: Jātiyā brāhmaṇo hoti, udāhu bhavati kammunā;
anya-e0902n:529_0: Ajānataṃ no pabrūhi, yathā jānemu brāhmaṇanti.
anya-e0902n:532_0: Pucchā – subhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:533_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante subhaṃ māṇavaṃ todeyyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:533_2: Subho bhante māṇavo todeyyaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “brāhmaṇā bho gotama evamāhaṃsu’ gahaṭṭho ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalaṃ,
anya-e0902n:533_3: na pabbajito ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalanti,
anya-e0902n:534_1: puna pi āvuso subho māṇavo todeyyaputto kathaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n:535_1: “brāhmaṇā bho gotama evamāhaṃsu ‘mahaṭṭhamidaṃ mahākiccaṃ mahādhikaraṇaṃ mahāsamārambhaṃ,
anya-e0902n:535_6: Evaṃ kho bhante subho māṇavo todeyyaputto punapi bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
anya-e0902n:535_7: Bhagavā ca bhante “etthāpi kho ahaṃ māṇava vibhajjavādā,
anya-e0902n:537_0: Pucchā – saṅgāravasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:538_1: kosalesu bhante cañcalikappe nāma gāme saṅgāravaṃ māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:538_2: saṅgāravo bhante māṇavo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “santi kho bho gotama eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā diṭṭhadhammābhiññāvosānapāramippattā
anya-e0902n:538_4: Tatra bho gotama ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā diṭṭhadhammābhiññāvosānapāramippattā ādibrahmacariyaṃ paṭijānanti,
anya-e0902n:540_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena devadahasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:541_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante devadahe nāma sakyānaṃ nigame samma hule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:543_0: Pucchā – pañcattayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:544_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:546_0: Pucchā – kintisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:547_0: Vissajjanā – pisinārāyaṃ bhante baliharaṇe nāma vanasaṇḍe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:548_1: tattha āvuso bhagavā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū paṭipucchitvā ovādamadāsi,
anya-e0902n:548_2: yo bahujanassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0902n:549_1: tattha bhante bhagavā “kinti vo bhikkhave mayi hoti,
anya-e0902n:549_2: cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti,
anya-e0902n:549_5: itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ desetī”ti bhikkhū pucchitvā “tasmātiha bhikkhave ye vo mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā.
anya-e0902n:549_7: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
anya-e0902n:549_8: Tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabbaṃ” evamādinā bhante bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n:550_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā tattha dutiyampi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n:550_2: Yo bahujanassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0902n:551_1: tattha bhante bhagavā “tesañca vo bhikkhave samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ siyā aññatarassa bhikkhuno āpatti,
anya-e0902n:551_3: Tatra bhikkhave na codanāya taritabbaṃ puggalo upaparikkhitabbo”ti evamādinā bhikkhūnaṃ dutiyampi ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n:552_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā tattha tatiyampi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0902n:552_2: yo bahujanassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0902n:553_1: “tesañca vo bhikkhave samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ aññamaññassa vacīsaṃhāro uppajjeyya
anya-e0902n:553_2: diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavā tattha tatiyampi bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0902n:554_1: tenāvuso bhikkhunā evaṃ satthu ovādānusāsanikārinā āyasmā nu te bhikkhu akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetīti
anya-e0902n:554_2: parehi puṭṭhena kathaṃ sammā byākaramānena byākātabbaṃ.
anya-e0902n:555_3: tāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāsiṃ,
anya-e0902n:555_4: taṃ te bhikkhū dhammaṃ sutvā akusalā vuṭṭhahiṃsu kusale patiṭṭhahiṃsū”ti.
anya-e0902n:555_5: Evaṃ kho bhante tena bhikkhunā evaṃ satthu ovādānusāsanikārinā parehi puṭṭhena sammā byākaramānena byākātabbaṃ.
anya-e0902n:557_0: Pucchā – sāmagāmasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:558_1: sakkesu bhante sāmagāme nāma sakyānaṃ nigame āyasmantañca ānandaṃ āyasmantañca cundaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:558_2: āyasmā ca bhante ānando āyasmā ca cundo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamisu,
anya-e0902n:558_4: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ bhante cundo samaṇuddeso evamāha ‘nigaṇṭho bhante nāṭaputto pāvāyaṃ adhunā kālaṅkato,
anya-e0902n:558_5: tassa kālaṅkiriyāya bhinnā nigaṇṭhā dvedhikajātā bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti…pe…
anya-e0902n:558_7: Tassa mayhaṃ bhante evaṃ hoti ‘māheva bhagavato accayena saṅghe vivādo uppajji,
anya-e0902n:558_8: svāssa vivādo bahujanaahitāya bahujanaasukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussāna’nti”.
anya-e0902n:560_0: Pucchā – sunakkhattasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:561_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante sunakkhattaṃ licchaviputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:561_2: sunakkhatto bhante licchaviputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bhante sambahulehi
anya-e0902n:561_3: kira bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā khīṇā jāti,
anya-e0902n:561_7: Kacci te bhante bhikkhū sammadeva aññaṃ byākaṃsu,
anya-e0902n:561_8: udāhu santetthekacce bhikkhū adhimānena aññaṃ byākaṃsū”ti,
anya-e0902n:563_0: Pucchā – āneñjasappāyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:564_0: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:566_0: Pucchā – gaṇakamoggallānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:567_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante gaṇakamoggallānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:567_2: gaṇakamoggallāno bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “seyyāthāpi bho gotama imassa migāramātupāsādassa
anya-e0902n:567_3: dissati anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā yadidaṃ yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarā…pe…
anya-e0902n:567_4: sakkā nukho bho gotama imasmimpi dhammavinaye evameva anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā paññapetu”nti,
anya-e0902n:568_1: evaṃ vutte kho āvuso gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ kiṃ avoca,
anya-e0902n:569_1: evaṃ vutte bhante gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kiṃ nu kho bhoto gotamassa sāvakā
anya-e0902n:569_2: bhotā gotamena evaṃ ovadīyamānā evaṃ anusāsīyamānā sabbe accantaṃ niṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārodhenti,
anya-e0902n:569_4: bhagavā ca bhante “appekacce kho brāhmaṇa mama sāvakā mayā evaṃ ovadīyamānā evaṃ anusāsīyamānā accantaṃ niṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārādhenti,
anya-e0902n:569_5: ekacce nārādhentī”ti evamādinā gaṇakamoggallānassa brāhmaṇassa byākāsi.
anya-e0902n:570_1: imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā gaṇako moggallāno imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n:571_1: imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo “ye me bho gotama puggalā asaddhā jīvikatthā
anya-e0902n:571_2: na saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n:573_0: Pucchā – gopakamoggallānasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:574_1: rājagahe bhante gopakamoggallānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:574_2: gopakamoggallāno bhante brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “atthi nu kho bho ānanda ekabhikkhupi tehi
anya-e0902n:574_3: dhammehi sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ samannāgato,
anya-e0902n:574_4: yehi dhammehi samannāgato so bhavaṃ gotamo ahosi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti,
anya-e0902n:575_1: kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhikkhuno pasādanīyā dhammā pakāsitā,
anya-e0902n:575_2: ye tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena akkhātā.
anya-e0902n:575_3: Yehi ca samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū sakkareyyuṃ garuṃ kareyyuṃ māneyyuṃ pūjeyyuṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyuṃ.
anya-e0902n:576_2: pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
anya-e0902n:576_5: yeme dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti,
anya-e0902n:576_6: tathārūpassa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti evamādinā
anya-e0902n:576_7: bhante tattha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena dasa pasādanīyā dhammā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:576_8: Ye tena bhagatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena akkhātā,
anya-e0902n:576_9: yehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ etarahi bhikkhū sakkareyyuṃ garuṃ kareyyuṃ māneyyuṃ pūjeyyuṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyuṃ.
anya-e0902n:577_1: evaṃ vutte kho āvuso vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto kīdisaṃ pasaṃsāvacanaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0902n:577_2: kathañcassa āyasmā ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko taṃ vacanaṃ paṭisodhetvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n:578_1: evaṃ vutte vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto upanandaṃ senāpatiṃ āmantesi “taṃ kiṃ maññasi bhavaṃ senāpati,
anya-e0902n:578_6: āyasmā ca bhante ānando “na ca kho brāhmaṇa so bhagavā sabbaṃ jhānaṃ vaṇṇesi,
anya-e0902n:578_7: napi so bhagavā sabbaṃ jhānaṃ na vaṇṇesī”ti evamādinā taṃ vacanaṃ paṭisodhetvā pakāsesi.

anya-e0902n:612_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:614_0: Pucchā – ānāpānassatisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:615_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:615_2: therā bhante bhikkhū nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n:615_3: appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n:615_4: appekacce therā bhikkhū vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n:615_5: appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṃsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n:615_6: appekacce therā bhikkhū cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n:615_7: te ca bhante navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ jānanti,
anya-e0902n:617_0: Pucchā – kāyagatāsatisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:618_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:618_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṃ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ
anya-e0902n:618_5: yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā vuttā mahānisaṃsā”ti,
anya-e0902n:620_0: Pucchā – saṅkhārūpapattisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:621_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:622_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā saṅkhārūpapattiyo vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:623_1: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu saddhāya samannāgato hoti,
anya-e0902n:623_6: tassa evaṃ hoti “aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya”nti
anya-e0902n:623_7: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā saṅkhārūpapattiyo vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:625_0: Pucchā – cūḷasuññatasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:626_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:626_2: āyasmā bhante ānando sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ
anya-e0902n:626_3: bhagavā sakkesu viharati nagarakaṃ nāma sakyānaṃ nigamo,
anya-e0902n:626_4: tattha me bhante bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ,
anya-e0902n:626_6: suññatāvihārenāhaṃ ānanda etarahi bahulaṃ viharāmīti kacci metaṃ bhante sussutaṃ suggahitaṃ sumanasikataṃ sūpadhārita”nti,
anya-e0902n:628_0: Pucchā – mahāsuññatasuttaṃ panāvuto bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:629_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:629_2: āyasmā bhante ānando sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ghaṭāya sakkassa vihāre cīvarakammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0902n:631_1: acchariyaabbhutasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:632_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:632_2: Sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṃ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ
anya-e0902n:632_5: Yatra hi nāma tathāgato atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte jānissati.
anya-e0902n:634_0: Pucchā – bākulasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:635_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante acelaṃ kassapaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā bākulattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:637_0: Pucchā – dantabhūmisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:638_1: rājagahe bhante jayasenaṃ rājakumāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:638_2: Jayaseno bhante rājakumāro aciravataṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bho aggivessana
anya-e0902n:638_3: idha bhikkhu appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto phuseyya cittassa ekaggata”nti,
anya-e0902n:639_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā aciravatassa samaṇuddesassa samassāsetvā dhammadesanānayo pakāsito.
anya-e0902n:640_2: yaṃ taṃ nekkhammena ñātabbaṃ nekkhammena daṭṭhabbaṃ nekkhammena pattabbaṃ nekkhammena sacchikātabbaṃ,
anya-e0902n:640_3: taṃ vata jayaseno rājakumāro kāmamajjhe vasanto kāme paribhuñjanto kāmavitakkehi khajjamāno kāmapariḷāhena
anya-e0902n:640_4: pariḍayhamāno kāmapariyosanāya ussuko ussati vā dakkhati vā sacchi vā karissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti
anya-e0902n:640_5: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato aciravatassa samaṇuddesassa samassāsetvā,
anya-e0902n:640_6: seyyathāpissu aggivessana dve hatthidammā vā assadammāvā godammā vā sudantā suvinītāti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0902n:641_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavā dve upamāyo dassetvā tatuttari dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍheti.
anya-e0902n:642_1: seyyathāpi aggivessana rājākhattiyo muddhāvasitto nāgavanikaṃ āmantetīti evamādinā bhante bhagavā uttaripi dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhesi.
anya-e0902n:644_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhūmijasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:645_1: rājagahe bhante jayasenaṃ rājakumāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:645_2: jayaseno bhante rājakumāro āyasmantaṃ bhūmijaṃ etadavoca “santi bho bhūmija eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino
anya-e0902n:645_11: Idha bhoto bhūmijassa satthā kiṃvādī kimakkhāyī”ti tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:646_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā āyasmato bhūmijattherassa taṃ byākaraṇaṃ samanujānitvā tatuttari dhammadesanānayo paripūretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n:647_1: taggha tvaṃ bhūmija evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ byākaramāno vuttavādī ceva me hosi,
anya-e0902n:647_3: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā āyasmato bhūmijassa taṃ vacanaṃ samanujānitvā “yehi kehici bhūmija samaṇā
anya-e0902n:647_4: vā brāhmaṇā vā micchādiṭṭhino micchāsaṅkappā micchāvācā micchākammantā micchāājīvā micchāvāyāmā micchāsatī
anya-e0902n:647_7: abhabbā phalassa adhigamāyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā āyasmato bhūmijassa uttari desanānayo paripūretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n:649_0: Pucchā – anuruddhasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:650_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā anuruddhattherena bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:650_2: pañcakaṅgo bhante thapati āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavoca “idha maṃ bhante therā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0902n:650_4: ekacce therā evamāhaṃsu ‘mahaggataṃ gahapati cetovimuttiṃ bhāvehī”ti,
anya-e0902n:650_5: yā cāyaṃ bhante appamāṇā cetovimutti yā ca mahaggatā cetovimutti,
anya-e0902n:650_6: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
anya-e0902n:650_7: udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nānanti” tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:652_0: Pucchā – upakkilesasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:653_0: Vissajjanā – pācīnavaṃsadāye bhante āyasmantaṃ anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:655_0: Pucchā – bālapaṇḍitasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:656_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:657_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni ca bālassa diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhadomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:658_1: tīṇimāni bhikkhave bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālanimittāni bālāpadānāni.
anya-e0902n:658_3: Idha bhikkhave bālo duccintitacintī ca hoti dubbhāsitabhāsī ca dukkaṭakammakārī cāti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0902n:658_4: tattha bhagavatā bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni ca bālassa diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhadomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:659_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa samparāyo ca tattha niraye bālassa dukkhadomanassapaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:660_1: sa kho so bhikkhave bālo kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā
anya-e0902n:660_2: kāyassa bhedāparaṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n:660_3: bālassa samparāyo ca tattha ca bālassa niraye dukkhadomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:661_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa tiracchānayoniyaṃ dukkhadomanassapaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:662_1: santi bhikkhave tiracchānagatā pāṇā tiṇabhakkhā te allānipi tiṇāni sukkhānipi tiṇāni dantullehakaṃ khādantīti
anya-e0902n:662_2: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā bālassa tiracchānayoniyaṃ dukkhadomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:663_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālena sakiṃ vinipātagatena puna manussattadullabhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:664_1: seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso ekacchiggalaṃ yugaṃ mahāsamudde pakkhipeyya,
anya-e0902n:664_2: tamenaṃ puratthimo vāto pacchimena saṃhareyyāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā bālena sakiṃ vinipātagatena puna manussattassa dullabhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:665_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgatassapi dukkhabahulatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:666_1: sa kho so bhikkhave bālo sace kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgacchatīti evamādinā
anya-e0902n:666_2: bhante tattha bhagavatā bālassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgatassapi dukkhabahulatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:667_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni ca paṇḍitassa diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:668_1: tīṇimāni bhikkhave paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni paṇḍitanimittāni paṇḍitāpadānāni.
anya-e0902n:668_3: Idha bhikkhave paṇḍito sucintitacintī ca hoti subhāsitabhāsī ca sukatakammakārī cāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n:669_0: Paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni ca diṭṭheva dhamme paṇḍitassa sukhasomanassapaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:670_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa samparāyo ca tattha sagge sukhasomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:671_1: sa kho so bhikkhave paṇḍito kāyena sucaritaṃ caritvā vācāya manasā sucaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
anya-e0902n:671_2: maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa samparāyo ca sagge
anya-e0902n:672_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgatassapi sukhabahulatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n:673_1: sa kho so bhikkhave paṇḍito sace kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgacchati,
anya-e0902n:673_2: yāni tāni uccākulāni khattiyamahāsālakulaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālakulaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālakulaṃ vā tathārūpe
anya-e0902n:673_3: kule paccājāyatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena
anya-e0902n:675_2: sammāsambuddhena cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:676_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante subhaṃ māṇavaṃ todeyyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:676_2: Subho bhante māṇavo todeyyaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0902n:676_3: yena manussānaṃyeva sataṃ manussabhūtānaṃ dissanti hīnappaṇītatā.
anya-e0902n:676_4: Dissanti hi bho gotama manussā appāyukā,
anya-e0902n:676_18: Ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0902n:676_19: yena manussānaṃyeva sataṃ manussabhūtānaṃ dissanti hīnappaṇītatā”ti tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:677_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ dīghāyukaappāyukasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:678_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā pāṇātipātī hoti,
anya-e0902n:678_2: luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno pāṇabhūtesūti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā appāyukadīghāyukasaṃvattanakāni
anya-e0902n:679_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ appābādhabavhābādhasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:680_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā sattānaṃ viheṭṭhakajātiko hoti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunāvā daṇḍenavā satthena
anya-e0902n:680_2: vāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ appābādhabavhābādhasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:681_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:682_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo,
anya-e0902n:682_2: appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patiṭṭhiyati,
anya-e0902n:682_3: kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarotīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:683_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ mahesakkha appesakkhasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:684_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā issāmanako hoti,
anya-e0902n:684_2: paralābhasakkāra garukāra mānanavandana pūjāsu issati upadussati issaṃ bandhatīti evamādinā bhante tattha
anya-e0902n:684_3: bhagavatā sattānaṃ appesakkhamahesakkhasaṃvattanakāni kammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:685_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā mahābhogaappabhogasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:686_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā na dātā hoti,
anya-e0902n:686_2: samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vattaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandha vilepanaṃ seyyavasathapadīpeyyanti evamādinā
anya-e0902n:686_3: bhante tattha bhagavatā mahābhogaappabhogasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:687_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ uccākulīna nīcakulīnasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:688_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā thaddho hoti atimāni abhivādetabbaṃ na abhivādeti,
anya-e0902n:688_8: pūjetabbaṃ na pūjetīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ uccākulīna nīcakulīnasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:689_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ mahāpaññaduppaññasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n:690_1: idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā na paripucchitā hoti “kiṃ bhante kusalaṃ,
anya-e0902n:690_7: Kiṃ me karīyamānaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti,
anya-e0902n:690_8: kiṃ vā pana me karīyamānaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ
anya-e0902n:692_0: Pucchā – indriyabhāvanāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n:693_1: gajaṅgalāyaṃ bhante uttaraṃ nāma māṇavaṃ pārāsiviyantevāsiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n:693_2: uttaro bhante māṇavo pārāsiviyantevāsī bhagavatā puṭṭho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “idha bho gotama cakkhunā rūpaṃ na passati,
anya-e0902n:693_4: Evaṃ kho bho gotama deseti pārāsiviyo brāhmaṇo sāvakānaṃ indriyabhāvana”nti.
